sentence: The image is an infographic on global food supply.
It has a gray background with white and turquoise graphics and text.

sentence_cn: - 标题：“全球粮食供应”，白色。

sentence: - A visual representation of white and turquoise icons resembling grains or plants.
sentence_cn: - 以白色和绿松石色图标来表示谷物或植物的视觉形象。

sentence: The turquoise icons make up 75%, and the white ones make up 25%.
sentence_cn: 绿松石图标占 75%，白色图标占 25%。

sentence: - Text indicates that 75% of the food supply comes from only 12 plant and 5 animal species.
sentence_cn: - 文本表明 75% 的食物供应仅来自 12 种植物和 5 种动物。

sentence: - Additional text highlights that nearly 60% of the calories/proteins from plants in the human diet come from just three plants: Corn, Wheat, and Rice.
sentence_cn: - 附加文字强调，人类饮食中近 60% 的植物热量/蛋白质来自三种植物：玉米、小麦和大米。

sentence: - A pie chart comparing edible plant species and those consumed by humans.
sentence_cn: - 比较可食用植物种类和人类食用植物种类的饼图。

sentence: - Shows there are 300,000 edible plant species, but only 150-200 are consumed by humans.
sentence_cn: - 显示有 300,000 种可食用植物，但只有 150-200 种被人类食用。

sentence: - Attribution to Terreform Center for Advanced Urban Research.
sentence_cn: - 归功于 Terreform 高级城市研究中心。

sentence: - A reference note citing the source from the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization, 2005.
sentence_cn: - 引用联合国粮食及农业组织 2005 年的数据来源的参考说明。

sentence: The overall theme emphasizes the limited diversity in food sources despite the availability of numerous edible plant species.
sentence_cn: 总体主题强调尽管可食用植物种类繁多，但食物来源的多样性却有限。
